website_summaries.verdict: A good beginner trumpet if you don't know if your child is going to stick with the instrument or not.
pros: The price is certainly right on this model
Works well for a student band environment
Lightweight model is good for younger players
Comes in several options on the finish including blue and red
cons: Trumpet doesn't quite have the rich sound of the higher-end models, but it is a great horn for beginners

website_summaries.verdict: A standard trumpet with a pristine finish.
pros: Solid brass B-flat trumpet delivers terrific sound
Includes carrying case and cleaning kit
Sold in a variety of finishes
cons: Trumpet's valves may start to stick, even after limited use

customer_reviews.title: Thank God for youtube...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the instrument it seems that the valves were out of sequence (I could not blow through the horn) and a little sticky. Being a novice, I was ready to stick it back in the box and return it. After I watched a few videos on YouTube, I figured out that if I resequenced them it may help. That plus a little valve grease now I have a working horn. I think most of the problems you have with buying online has to do with quality control when these products leave the manufacturer. Most of us are buying an instrument for the first time so we have no idea what to look for and how to troubleshoot.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer_-72681

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: Valves were continuously stuck and sliding tuner was often stuck. I constantly had to grease the valves and slide. I had this trumpet for about three and a half months and the second valve got stuck like it was gorilla-glued. The insides of the trumpet corroded very quickly, which is what caused the valves to stick. I took it to a music store and they said it would be best to purchase a new one. I'm very disappointed. I would not recommend this model to anyone. It's a cheap model, but it's not worth purchasing. It's worth purchasing a trumpet that costs more but will be in proper order for years.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Not band quality even for schools.
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty trumpet but it is not band or even tutor approved. We have given this over a month (my mistake) to have it "broken in". Both my son's band teacher at school and his trumpet tutor have said that it is off tune. They both have over 20 years of experience but giving the instrument the benefit of the doubt, they waited and finally tested the instrument with an electric tuner. The sound is tingy and hallow. The band teacher and the trumpet tutor both told my son it was not allowed to be used for practice or concerts. I'm out alot of money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Zarilla

customer_reviews.title: Glory makes good instruments
customer_reviews.text: This is the second instrument I've bought from Glory, the first being an alto saxophone, and both instruments are amazing for such a low price. Some have complained about the key return, saying that they get stuck a lot, but on the one I received the key return is great, they all travel smoothly and none of them have gotten stuck once. The slides are a different story, one travels fine but the other gets stuck often and needs to be forced. My main complaint would be that the sound quality isn't great, but unless you're a professional that isn't super important.
customer_reviews.author: Catharine M

customer_reviews.title: Love it💖
customer_reviews.text: I love this trumpet it is amazing! It’s the prettiest trumpet I have ever seen. Along with being beautiful it plays phenomenally. The only thing that I struggled with was making the switch from my old trumpet to this trumpet. Re-adapting the way I play to better fit this trumpet only took five minutes witch was good. I highly recommend this trumpet to anyone who is interested in playing the trumpet. I have played the trumpet for three years and I had a expensive name brand trumpet but when I switched to this one it played better then my old one and it looks better.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: 2 Valves were STUCK and USELESS. 2nd trumpet was better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trumpet for lessons for my son. The valves are STICKY. You need to have oil and place correctly or valve won't move...at all. The first trumpet they sent us, 2 Valves were STUCK and USELESS. 2nd trumpet was better, but still needs lots of oil to move correctly. The sound however is awesome! I have played the trumpet for 37 years and this has a good sound to it for kids to play in band. Good luck, make sure you have one that works properly. We've had ours for 30 days and consider it ok, not great and not good, but ok enough to own for band.
customer_reviews.author: littlemizme

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant on this do to some of the reviews, but I have to say this is a pretty good trumpet for the money we have three children in band 2 play the trumpet and as a parent renting 3 instruments a month can be very costly. For less than 3 rental fees we took a chance and it has been so far a decent trumpet. Our older son likes it just as well as the rental sounds the same to us. So if your a parent with a budget this should work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Mayhem

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it is awesome. Compared to a thousand dollar trumpet, it doesn't really compare though. But for a spare trumpet, when a parent doesn't want their kid transporting their expensive one from school back and forth, it works fine. My son and I were playing them together, and there is indeed a difference in sound with this cheap one, but it is for practice only, and as I said, is fine. I would still recommend it, but I wouldn't recommend it as the only trumpet, or for a concert where other people will need to here it.
customer_reviews.author: ohjonny

customer_reviews.title: good sound and intonation,excellent price
customer_reviews.text: good trumpet for young Trumpet player ,excellent price, good sound and intonation do not forget to buy accessories for this trumpet Valve guard Mouthpiece Pouch and booster that will improve your sound
customer_reviews.author: MK music

customer_reviews.title: If it worked, I would have been extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: The valves (buttons) wouldn't push down, open up, or otherwise move even after being oiled. Couldn't play a single note even though it was stuck in open position. I've been playing trumpet for a couple years so I knew what I was doing. I just wanted to buy my own trumpet instead of renting from my school. Buying this was a very disheartening experience.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Ibala

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive But Not Cheap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 9 year old granddaughter. And while it was less expensive than some other options, it isn't cheap. Quality product, the photos do not do it justice. It's lovely. Granddaughter loves it and indicated that the other band members want to look at it every practice. Overall I think I made the correct decision getting this trumpet over the other options.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Some "Assembly" Required.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned at first because my daughter couldn't get any sound to come out, but luckily we had a couple of former trumpet players visiting and they were able to get it all set up correctly and get the keys to stop sticking. I'm not terribly familiar with the instrument, but I'm sure that's something you have to do with all of them when they're new. We'll see how it lasts the school year, but so far we are happy with the product and the value.
customer_reviews.author: Amilena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Student Instrument!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trumpet for my 5th header as a student instrument, and although it had some bad reviews thought we would try it out anyhow. We can say it was well worth the money. It did have a small burr in it that caused the note to stick, but a skilled band teacher took a minute with it and got it working right as rain!! Here we are almost 5 months with the trumpet and it’s working perfectly!! The case is super durable and we would recommend this product to anyone, in fact we have to other students who wanted to try the trumpet next year!!
customer_reviews.author: jbrumbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trumpet for my son in 2016 and he has had it and been playing for 3 years now but it cracked and broke in several places around the valve and the company that does repairs for the school said it can't be repaired. It was a good beginner trumpet but I am not happy that it didn't last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Ali B

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for the price.  Much cheaper than a years rental.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who joined the 5th grade band. Came well packaged. All the valves worked as they should, after a few uses some sticking was happening. Picked up some better valve oil as the teacher suggested and all is well again. So far so good, and at a great price! If anything changes as the year goes on I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Pro PhotoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Hard to play
customer_reviews.text: My sister has been playing trumpet for 50 years. She tried this out that I bought for my granddaughter and it is hard to play... as it it takes more air and strength to get noise to come out. It is priced very well for a reason. My sister’s trumpet would likely be $500-$700 if bought new. My granddaughter could play hers with ease and struggled with this. Money wasted because I want to encourage her to play not discourage her.
customer_reviews.author: Amy J

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing instrument came not working!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter-in-law For Christmas. Listed like new, thought it was a fair price, but turned out to be very expensive price. Like new but it was unplayable! One of the valves was not working when we received. I thought maybe it would be a cheap fix but I spent almost as much for the repair as we paid for trumpet! We took to be repaired and found out when it was used they didn’t clean trumpet after use, and let it sit for a long time causing it to ruin the the valve! It took a lot of cleaning and some new parts to get it to work!
customer_reviews.author: bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Trumpet by Glory
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet only lasted about a month before the valves started sticking. I wanted to send it back and found out the warrantee ended about 3 days before the trumpet messed up. We got it fixed. It cost almost to fix it as it would have to buy a new one. The band teacher convinced us to get a better name brand for almost 5 times as much money. I won't buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Nice horn for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this horn plays well with the right mouthpiece. If not abused, I think it will last. No horn will work satisfactorily if it is never cleaned out and the valves rarely, if ever, oiled until they don't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: tom cantrell

customer_reviews.title: This blue trumpet is beautiful, he wish he could transfer whatever that's making ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one for my son for his music class. We search online and did everything we could possibly think of, but still can't make any sound with this trumpet. I finally went to a local music store and rented a old one. My son was able to make some sound right away with the rented trumpet. He then try the same thing on the brand new trumpet, no sound. This blue trumpet is beautiful, he wish he could transfer whatever that's making the rented trumpet work over to this blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lam

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my grandson, he's in the band in school. He loves it and said his band teacher was very impressed with the sound and the quality and the look of it. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 0 stars I would
customer_reviews.text: Should have known this would be garbage given the price. Valves were not aligned. When we unscrewed them to take a look we noticed they were used. The trumpet couldn’t even be played due to the valves being so bad. It was a nice set but end of the day...spend the money for a good instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Carol P

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for her first year in band. It is great for a starter and since it is a different color it helps it stand out a little and not get mixed up with another.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Huhman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant color, clean, crisp sound.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a Trumpet of the Glory brand that she has had for 2 years now still in wonderful condition. My son is beginning band this fall and he wanted to play the Trumpet as well so I ordered him one of the same brand this Blue one. The sound is crisp and perfect. The color is brilliant. Everything was carefully placed in the nicely sturdy made case. This is the perfect instrument for the price. Cannot beat that. So pleased with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY & GREAT LOOKING
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter needed a new trumpet after a failing valve. We chose the nickel plated with engraved flowers and she (and all the other players) loved it! It plays beautifully, as well. Great purchase experience from shippping to product quality!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: I love my new instrument
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to play trumpet along side my clarinet. This was an affordable way for me to be able to reach my goals. Not only that but I was able to pass it on to my brother in order for him to decide if he wanted to play it. I love my new instrument!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Saldivar

customer_reviews.title: Small issue
customer_reviews.text: After about a week it became unable to blow air through. Youtubed the problem and had to check the valves. Two were out of place. After moving the values and lining up the holes inside... it seems to be working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cormier

customer_reviews.title: MAJOR VALVE ISSUES!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 5 months ago for my son in 5th grade school band for $96 now I have a $112 REPAIR BILL, NO WARRANTY , CAN'T RETURN! The valves and springs are junk, locked up solid! DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Stunning finish!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price a great value. On mine all three valves were sticking. Had a lot of grit from being made inside valve cylinders. A quick cleaning and oiling and it plays like a dream. The engraving is incredibly detailed, it’s stunning! One of the most beautiful instruments I’ve ever seen! For the money wow!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price very professional
customer_reviews.text: Trump it works great for daughter in Middle School. Great learning an instrument professional quality built to last. Great product at great price.
customer_reviews.author: matthew tilman

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woodwind player. This was my first brass instrument and I'm so pleased!! I would give this 1000 stars if I could!! The quality is amazing!! The case is also very sturdy. If you are looking for a cheap trumpet, this is the PERFECT one for you.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerYasss

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Valve
customer_reviews.text: The 3rd valve sticks, it usually doesn't come back up - even after using almost 1/2 the bottle of oil on it, the valves were backwards too. It would be good for a new student if there wasn't an issue with the valve sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: You truly get what you're paying for
customer_reviews.text: If you are an experienced trumpet player, DON'T BUY IT, the valves stick, it is too slippery in the hand, and the tuning slide, 3rd valve slide, and 1st valve slides barely move. But maybe for a beginner, maybe. I recommend going to music and arts and buying or renting one of their student trumpets, much better value.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas gift !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a 12 year old who is learning to play the trumpet in her school band program. She really likes it by the way bleu is her favorite color.
customer_reviews.author: Princess B

customer_reviews.title: Stuck Valves
customer_reviews.text: When i first got the trumpet, It looked perfectly fine; until I tried to take the valves out. They wouldn't move at all. I managed to take the 1st and 3rd ones out, but the 2nd won't budge. But other than that, it works perfectly fine. I'm not extremely concerned about it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Z.

customer_reviews.title: Not very happy with this one but I guess you get what ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very happy with this one but I guess you get what you paid for. My son keeps complaining that the pieces keep falling apart. I need to get him a new one now.
customer_reviews.author: Sudhakar V.

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 5th grade beginner. I wqs afraid the band leader would say it wasn't good enuff, but he said it is great for a beginner. I was really pleased and he loves it. I bought the white one and it is sharp looking!!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Daum

customer_reviews.title: Vales stick
customer_reviews.text: Was great the first day now all vales stick even with oiling them, I dont think i shouldn't have to have a brand new out of the box instrument to get repaired. Like the case even tho kinda cheap it is light for easy carring for my son on the bus.
customer_reviews.author: wade1978

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: My trumpet broke within 3 days. It wasn’t built properly which is why it broke
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson and he loves it. He already plays the trombone and now he's doing great with this trumpet.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: It’s so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet is BEAUTIFUL! My nephew wanted one for his birthday. He’s still trying to figure out how to use it, but it’s pretty. We got the black nickel with engraving one it. It is just beautiful, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I.O.S. (Instrument Shaped Object)
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap. Didn’t last long at all and sounds terrible.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, even for the price. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Looks really nice.
customer_reviews.text: I think its a very good trumpet. Sounds great. Plays very accurately and easily. Looks really good. Amazing actually, that it costs less than $100.00.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Svare

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered quickly. My son loves it. The sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not A Tuba, It's A Trumpet!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a wicked value for a beginners trumpet. Solid build and my only criticism is that the valves get a bit sticky after playing for a while but not a deal killer. It's allowing me to get back into trumpet playing without denting the wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick V.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The Trumpet was exactly as discribe and has an awsome tone. I hesitate at first on the purchase because of the bad reviews, bit o am so happy I went with my instinct! My daughter's music teacher said it a excellent choose for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: bahamagirl

customer_reviews.title: like it hadn't been removed from the package and had ...
customer_reviews.text: This arrived and was tarnished, like it hadn't been removed from the package and had somehow gotten damp. One of the plugs was frozen shut as well (I was told this by our music teacher). My son loved it, but I had to send it back and try again with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: School approved works great
customer_reviews.text: I would say this is a great buy considering to rent the same one from school is 140 for 10months and to buy is 99
customer_reviews.author: nabeel

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the Worst Trumpet! I purchased this trumpet for my son and the valves keep getting stuck even after you apply the oil that is needed, it is always blocked so you can't make any sounds, it doesn't sound good even when its in tune. This company should charge $10 for this item not the current price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Found no problems
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be what I expected and hoped.I didn't have any of the problems I read about in the negative reviews.I'm a beginner on the trumpet,but it seems to be good quality for the price.I am really enjoying learning to play it
customer_reviews.author: ronald smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My son practices daily. Believe me it works great unfortunately. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Dewayne

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this trumpet for my daughter and the third ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this trumpet for my daughter and the third valve did in fact stick. When I took the valve out, I could tell it was already heavily greased and the Lubricant that came with the trumpet was already half way used up. I did return this item and request a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse P.

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's birthday it was greatly received. He stood in the parking lot at the restaurant for over an hour testing it out. The sound quality was better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beauharnois

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality item. Breaks fast.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke. My son had to get a new trumpet. Some keys were broke when we got it. Doesnt play well at all. Most students cannot use these in school bands.
customer_reviews.author: deanna cortes

customer_reviews.title: I am not pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson received the instrument, went to class and the valves stuck, teacher applied the valve oil and still they remained stuck. Teacher suggested that it be taken some place to be repaired. This is a brand new trumpet, no repairs should be necessary but they are and now we are stuck with the cost of getting it fixed. I am not pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P.

customer_reviews.title: Good as long you dont place a dent in value ...
customer_reviews.text: Plays but i need to get fixes ( dent value area ) and they could not get the parts.. Good as long you dont place a dent in value part, so best you spend the $$$ for a good trumpet so if it does get dents or what ever you con get it fix
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter in 7th grade. I was hesitant, but it's exactly what she needs at this stage. If she sticks with it we can upgrade. If you are first or second year like my daughter, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Crist

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginning student. Was a bit surprised that there were no instructions on how to use the solution that comes with it though. There's not even a label on it. Is it oil of some sort? Case is surprisingly well made for the price. Overall, very pleased with the purchase. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Happy band geek
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the trumpet!! I love the fact it came with the case, cleaning gloves, and cleaning tools. The convenience of having it all included made it simple to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SassyShoppingMomma7

customer_reviews.title: Trumpet is not good
customer_reviews.text: Keys and one of the slide valve did not work do not buy this Trumpet
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eckman

customer_reviews.title: New Instrument Is Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new trumpet. It is as good as any you could buy. It will last him well. He is a devoted brass man. He enjoys playing it.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Customer

customer_reviews.title: All of the valves and keys are stuck, appears to be a manufacture defect.
customer_reviews.text: The trumpet appears to be very nice quality but all of the keys and valves are stuck(even after being oiled). This is a Christmas present for my daughter and I am short on time to have this taken some where to be fixed...I am disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Product, doesn't work well
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a cheap trumpet but it really is cheap. One of the valves is already sticking no matter how we oil it. I should have known.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Tallent

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying I had to spend as much as it cost for repair after 30 days and they couldn’t guarantee it due to this brand. DO NOT BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: angeline goe

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for high school beginner, but when she dropped it it dented up bad. Had for 1 year when daughter decided she didn't want to play anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Louann Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: The product was delivered on time, upon opening the black case it comes in I was impressed at the quality of materials. The sound from it is also great for a beginner type trumpet. Fantastic product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved her trumpet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her trumpet. When she showed it to her instructor, she said the instructor didn't want to put down meaning he liked it also. Great for someone starting out . The finish also seemed pretty good, we wanted something a little different from the rest.
customer_reviews.author: Abstro

customer_reviews.title: Blow this horn
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and it’s working perfectly. Tuned correctly and is high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana L.

customer_reviews.title: Cuality
customer_reviews.text: Good cuality. Great for bigginers. I'm so happy w this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Malanga82

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas  ever!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my brother. He used to play a trumpet when he was a kid, but lost it so I bought him the trumpet. Also green is his favorite color. He said it was the best Christmas ever!
customer_reviews.author: Marcus B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: For only a little over 100$, this is great quality. Good for if you’re just trying to have fun when playing.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Coats

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet was absolutely beautiful! Unfortunately, it arrived severely damaged! Had to return and find an instrument elsewhere. Should never have been shipped/sold in such flawed condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Bones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this trumpet. It was delivered as stated on time and beautiful. This is why I shop here.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great for starters.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set up for the price. My daughter wanted it just to mess around with. Very pretty too and the case is a great bonus
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Balsbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It was just as described came with case and oil great starter kit!
customer_reviews.author: Cec

customer_reviews.title: Sticky keys|poor quality
customer_reviews.text: All reviews that state this trumpet is poor quality are correct. Keys stick....doesn’t work. Not even good for a 5 year old to use(which is why we bought it)
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: Customer service- Rep Albert
customer_reviews.text: All thought we got a Trumpet that don't work but Albert customer service Rep was very helpful, in addressing my problem. One of my reason for haven amazon prime is there products and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: isabell

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend
customer_reviews.text: Stoped working after 1 month of using it and washing it once, i wasnt happy .-.
customer_reviews.author: Shaylee Pease

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the valve oil that comes with it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Trumpet was ok. Sticky valves. I noticed that the oil that comes with the trumpet was junk. It leaves a sticky residue. So, I gave the horn a good bath and used the snake to clean out the pipes and the valve chambers and dried it overnight before reassembling. Then I used a good reputable slide grease and valve oil (Al Cass). No issues since. Does take a breaking in period though :) Sound and intonation is quite good. I would recommend for a beginner, intermediate, or for a person picking it up for a hobby that doesn't want to spend a great deal. Side note: Do not soak the instrument. The lacquer is quite thin.
customer_reviews.author: OSU Fan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price. One valve seemed a bit sticky though.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Horn
customer_reviews.text: Within a week, a valve broke. I wouldn't waste your time buying this horn.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: Great price and nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described and our boy loves it. He gets a lot of comments with his being the only instrument that stands out from all the others!
customer_reviews.author: Precision Tile

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but it did not come with lubricant it was dry as a bone. However, the quality is impeccable!
customer_reviews.author: John Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This trumpet was a big hit with my son. And in the school Colors!!!!
customer_reviews.author: wordlover

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: my trumpet players dont like the sound compared to our other trumpet
customer_reviews.author: lesley

customer_reviews.title: Not as shiny as the picture
customer_reviews.text: its good for the price but within a month it looses and shiny and i needed to put valve oil in it way more than i should've. I recommend saving a bit more money and buying a better one.
customer_reviews.author: James Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Band instructor is very happy for a starter instrument and it didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: We bought this trumpet for our son in 5th grade. It is perfect for him. We did not want to spend an arm and leg for a trumpet. And buying this came out way cheaper than renting one too.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Pen

customer_reviews.title: Great, save for the spilled oil
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, arrived quickly, overall a great product. My only complaint would be that the valve and key oil it came with was spilled into the case and didn’t have any left in the bottle by the time it arrived. Aside from wiping the oil off of everything, it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Oil
customer_reviews.text: The oil that came with it inside the package was leaked out inside the package
customer_reviews.author: Norm Powell

customer_reviews.title: I love this it sounds great and is very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this it sounds great and is very beautiful. I have no trouble finding notes and the valves are in mint condition.
customer_reviews.author: KathyAH

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my son and he loves it ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and he loves it. I have had no problems with it. And his teacher thought it was well made. And now 3 other students have got one and the band is very colorful
customer_reviews.author: bgeorgw

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great investment instead of renting. Will spend more than that for a year of lessons. The product is great fo my daughter who is just starting out. Good quality to.
customer_reviews.author: Lais

customer_reviews.title: Sweet sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love this horn. Gracefully built and designed for real players.
customer_reviews.author: KWill

customer_reviews.title: Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: It good but I still can’t blow on it but the money I spent was good
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Martínez

customer_reviews.title: Repair them I got it
customer_reviews.text: Looks fancy but son took it to school for band and it needs to be brought in for repair. Stated the valves were gunky and do not lock into place..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Trumpet
customer_reviews.text: Had to get for my sons 2 year music class. Rented one for my other son and spent over $400 renting it. Makes more sense to buy this and have forever! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Great but missing valve oil
customer_reviews.text: Great product but was missing the valve oil when it came

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item it works lasts you dosen”t break and it makes a great sound don’t need a lot of value oil.

Color:black nickel engraved flowersIt is a standard trumpet suitable for beginning students. 
Teachers can recommend them to their students. 
It features flawless finish,Beautiful sound,easy to play student instruments 
Glory trumpet is easily to play, before send to customers, it is finely tuned,do not need tuner to tuning again. 
Before delivery, our trumpet are tested by professional quality inspector again to verify that they meet our standards
feature_bullets: Includes: Light weight hard case, soft polishing cloth and a pair of white gloves
Whether you want to buy a trumpet for yourself or for your friends or others, this trumpet is a product of choice as a result of its high quality and cost effective price
